name: akatsuki
description: VITE+Supabase+Shuttle「Akatsuki」高速開発テンプレート

scripts.vibe:check: npm run lint:vibe --workspace=app-frontend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.setup:check: akatsuki setup check || cargo run --manifest-path packages/akatsuki-cli/Cargo.toml -- setup check || node scripts/check-setup.js
scripts.design:new: akatsuki design new "$@" || cargo run --manifest-path packages/akatsuki-cli/Cargo.toml -- design new "$@" || node scripts/create-design.js "$@"
scripts.design:list: akatsuki design list || cargo run --manifest-path packages/akatsuki-cli/Cargo.toml -- design list || node scripts/list-designs.js
scripts.design:use: akatsuki design use || cargo run --manifest-path packages/akatsuki-cli/Cargo.toml -- design use || node scripts/use-design.js
scripts.design:publish: akatsuki design publish "$@" || cargo run --manifest-path packages/akatsuki-cli/Cargo.toml -- design publish "$@" || node scripts/publish-design.js "$@"
